# This file was generated by FRUT's Jucer2CMake from "Synthesizer.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("OSCSynthesizer")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


set(Synthesizer_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Synthesizer.jucer"
)


set(JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH "/Applications/JUCE/modules")


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_FORMAT_VERSION "1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${Synthesizer_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "NoKr3Z"
)

  PROJECT_NAME "OSCSynthesizer"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  COMPANY_NAME "MUMT306"

)
